titles.title: To designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 100 North Main Street in Strawberry, Arkansas, as the "Noel Austin Harris, Jr. Post Office".

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

bill.summary: 7/24/2013--Introduced. Designates the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 100 North Main Street in Strawberry, Arkansas, as the "Noel Austin Harris, Jr. Post Office."
